name: ZOMB (itch) (Diogeneskek)
description:
I tried making a doom clone based of Miziziziz's Tutorial (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LbyyjmOji0M)

I spent about an hour and a half on the game. I didn't really like the way it turned out and it was kind of a boring tutorial (no offense to Miziziziz, he makes great videos)

I don't pllan on porting it or updating it.
